earthquake.title: Earthquake Crisis
earthquake.story: A strong earthquake hit the island in the early morning. Internet is down in some areas, not everyone can access aid info, and fake news is spreading on social media. **Mission**: Spread correct info fast and ensure people are safe.

advisors.name: Security Guard
advisors.text: We can slow down social media to reduce panic, but some teens might feel restricted.

advisors.name: Legal Advisor
advisors.text: Instead of broad restriction, let's make emergency aid info visible to everyone. It's fairer.

advisors.name: Counselor
advisors.text: Let's share calming messages. This builds trust.

advisors.name: Tech Specialist
advisors.text: Announce aid points via mass SMS. Fast and effective.

action_cards.name: Slow Down Social Media
action_cards.tooltip: Reduces fake news but lowers freedom feeling.

action_cards.name: Platform Harmony
action_cards.tooltip: Highlight true info and tag fake news.

action_cards.name: Informative Messages
action_cards.tooltip: Sharing calming and educational public messages.

earthquake.immediate_text: Your choice is active: {}. Info flow improved in some areas, people are calmer.
earthquake.delayed_text: Fake news impact reduced, aid distribution organized. Some teens discuss restrictions.

forest_fire.title: Forest Fire
forest_fire.story: A large forest fire started in the south. Fake evacuation info is shared on social media. **Mission**: Ensure teens and families reach correct routes and prevent panic.

advisors.name: Security Guard
advisors.text: Temporary regional restriction can stop fake routes.

advisors.name: Legal Advisor
advisors.text: Making official routes visible is fairer than restricting.

advisors.name: Teacher
advisors.text: We can make short videos explaining safe behavior.

advisors.name: Tech Specialist
advisors.text: Sending emergency alerts to phones is effective.

action_cards.name: Block False Info
action_cards.tooltip: Stops fake evacuation info fast but reduces freedom feeling.

action_cards.name: Warning Messages
action_cards.tooltip: Correct evacuation routes sent to phones.

forest_fire.immediate_text: Your choice is active: {}. Evacuations sped up, some teens discuss delays.
forest_fire.delayed_text: Fire contained; fake routes impact greatly reduced.

pandemic.title: Pandemic Period
pandemic.story: A disease is spreading fast. Fake cures and conspiracy theories are circulating. **Mission**: Ensure teens access reliable info and increase rule compliance.

advisors.name: Health Expert
advisors.text: We can set up an alert system showing risky areas.

advisors.name: Tech Specialist
advisors.text: We can use notifications tagging false info.

advisors.name: Legal Advisor
advisors.text: Restrictions are accepted more if clearly justified.

advisors.name: Youth Worker
advisors.text: We can prepare short info videos for teens.

action_cards.name: Risk Map
action_cards.tooltip: Risky areas notified; some teens find it too controlling.

action_cards.name: Short Edu Videos
action_cards.tooltip: Correct disease info explained suitably for teens.

pandemic.immediate_text: Your choice is active: {}. Info flow sped up; access issues remain in some areas.
pandemic.delayed_text: False info reduced, teens comply with rules more.

election.title: Election Period
election.story: Fake videos and edited content circulate as election nears. Teens don't know who to trust. **Mission**: Ensure teens reach correct info and protect election security.

advisors.name: Comms Expert
advisors.text: Adding warning tags to fake videos reduces confusion.

advisors.name: Teacher
advisors.text: Let's prepare examples teaching how to spot truth.

advisors.name: Cyber Expert
advisors.text: We can organize volunteer teams for face-to-face info.

advisors.name: Legal Advisor
advisors.text: If every decision is transparent, teens won't suspect censorship.

action_cards.name: Fake Content Warning
action_cards.tooltip: Adding explanation tags to fake videos.

action_cards.name: Share Truth
action_cards.tooltip: Spreading real speeches and verified info.

action_cards.name: Media Literacy
action_cards.tooltip: Teaching teens how to spot fake content.

election.immediate_text: Your choice is active: {}. Some fake videos stopped, but debates continue.
election.delayed_text: False info impact reduced; teens trust the election process more.
